faq.paymentMethodAnswer: Through bank transfer to your account with payment processing upon host checkout
faq.cancelReservationAnswer: Yes, you can cancel the reservation, and the full amount paid will be refunded
faq.changePriceAnswer: Yes, you can change the price and space details, and the price and details will be reviewed by the support team, and you will be informed of the change. You can cancel the change if you are not satisfied with it
faq.cancelSpaceAnswer: Yes, you can cancel the space, and the full amount paid will be refunded
faq.hostSpaceDescription: Earn with us by hosting your space and increasing your monthly income
